column3: and our waitress demands that we quickly tell her our happy hour order before it's officially over. Well
column4: okay. I guess it wouldn't hurt to start off with some lighter dishes. Off the HH menu
column5: we tried the Kobe beef tacos
column7: and fresh catch ceviche. The portions are TINY. I'm a growing boy. If I'm gonna pay $8 for two 4 inch tacos
column8: or 8 mini pieces of salmon roll
column9: they better blow my pants off. But they were just okay. The ceviche was really good
column12: lemony all at the same time; but still like 2 bites.
